description: Prodeman, founded in 1984, has evolved from a small agricultural venture into a significant player in the peanut industry. Located in General Cabrera, CÃ³rdoba, the company now manages over 40,000 hectares and employs 650 people. With a focus on sustainability and innovation, Prodeman aims to produce finished food products, including snacks and flours, while also generating energy from peanut shell waste, showcasing a commitment to circular economy practices. They emphasise the importance of education and community involvement, including the establishment of a local secondary school.
name: Prodeman
